languages.text: {n}День за днем она наблюдает, как тяжело работают серфы, выжимая последние капли сил. И в глазах ее нет сострадания. Они — ресурс, который ей велено использовать, а затем выбросить. Она ненавидит их... потому что винит в своей боли. Своих ранах.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ты наблюдаешь, как тяжело работают сервы, выжимая последние капли сил. И в глазах твоих нет сострадания. Они — инструмент. Ресурс, который тебе велено использовать, а затем выбросить. Ты ненавидишь их... потому что винишь в своей боли. Своих ранах.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Day after day, she watches the serfs labour away, exhausting their last vestiges of strength. And there is no compassion in her eyes. They are simply a resource she is commanded to use and then discard. She hates them because she blames them for her pain, her wounds.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}День за днем она наблюдает, как тяжело работают серфы, выжимая последние капли сил. И в глазах ее нет сострадания. Они — ресурс, который ей велено использовать, а затем выбросить. Она ненавидит их... потому что винит в своей боли. Своих ранах.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Day after day, she watches the serfs work hard, exhausting their last vestiges of strength. And there is no compassion in her eyes. They are a resource she is commanded to use and then discard. She hates them because she blames them for her pain, her wounds.{/n}

{n}Day after day, she watches the serfs work hard, exhausting their last vestiges of strength. And there is no compassion in her eyes. They are a resource she is commanded to use and then discard. She hates them because she blames them for her pain, her wounds.{/n}

{n}Day after day, she watches the serfs labour away, exhausting their last vestiges of strength. And there is no compassion in her eyes. They are simply a resource she is commanded to use and then discard. She hates them because she blames them for her pain, her wounds.{/n}

{n}Day after day, she watches the serfs labour away, exhausting their last vestiges of strength. And there is no compassion in her eyes. They are simply a resource she is commanded to use and then discard. She hates them because she blames them for her pain, her wounds.{/n}

{n}Day after day, she watches the serfs labour away, exhausting their last vestiges of strength. And there is no compassion in her eyes. They are simply a resource she is commanded to use and then discard. She hates them because she blames them for her pain, her wounds.{/n}

{n}Day after day, she watches the serfs labour away, exhausting their last vestiges of strength. And there is no compassion in her eyes. They are simply a resource she is commanded to use and then discard. She hates them because she blames them for her pain, her wounds.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tag für Tag sieht sie zu, wie die Sklaven schuften, wie sie ihre letzten Kräfte aufopfern. Und in ihren Augen liegt keinerlei Mitgefühl. Die Sklaven sind lediglich eine Ressource, die sie zu befehligen und dann wegzuwerfen hat. Sie hasst sie, weil sie ihnen die Schuld an ihrem Schmerz gibt, an ihren Wunden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Day after day, she watches the serfs labour away, exhausting their last vestiges of strength. And there is no compassion in her eyes. They are simply a resource she is commanded to use and then discard. She hates them because she blames them for her pain, her wounds.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tag für Tag sieht sie zu, wie die Sklaven schuften, wie sie ihre letzten Kräfte aufopfern. Und in ihren Augen liegt keinerlei Mitgefühl. Die Sklaven sind lediglich eine Ressource, die sie zu befehligen und dann wegzuwerfen hat. Sie hasst sie, weil sie ihnen die Schuld an ihrem Schmerz gibt, an ihren Wunden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Día tras día, observa a los siervos mientras trabajan, exprimiendo sus últimas reservas de energía. No hay compasión en sus ojos. Son un mero recurso, y su deber es utilizarlos y, una vez agotados, deshacerse de ellos. Los odia porque los culpa por su dolor, por sus heridas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Day after day, she watches the serfs labour away, exhausting their last vestiges of strength. And there is no compassion in her eyes. They are simply a resource she is commanded to use and then discard. She hates them because she blames them for her pain, her wounds.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Día tras día, observa a los siervos mientras trabajan, exprimiendo sus últimas reservas de energía. No hay compasión en sus ojos. Son un mero recurso, y su deber es utilizarlos y, una vez agotados, deshacerse de ellos. Los odia porque los culpa por su dolor, por sus heridas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼女は毎日毎日、濃度たちが最後の力まで振り絞って働き続けるのを見る。その目には慈愛はない。彼らは単純に、彼女が使って捨てるように命じられた資源なのだ。彼女が彼らを嫌うのは、自分自身の痛みを彼らのせいにしているからだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Day after day, she watches the serfs labour away, exhausting their last vestiges of strength. And there is no compassion in her eyes. They are simply a resource she is commanded to use and then discard. She hates them because she blames them for her pain, her wounds.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女は毎日毎日、濃度たちが最後の力まで振り絞って働き続けるのを見る。その目には慈愛はない。彼らは単純に、彼女が使って捨てるように命じられた資源なのだ。彼女が彼らを嫌うのは、自分自身の痛みを彼らのせいにしているからだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}日复一日，她监视着那些仆役辛苦劳作，榨干他们最后一丝活力。她的眼神里没有任何怜悯，在她眼里，那些人不过只是资源而已。她收到了命令，要用光他们，丢弃他们。她痛恨他们，因为她把她的痛苦和创伤归咎于他们。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Day after day, she watches the serfs labour away, exhausting their last vestiges of strength. And there is no compassion in her eyes. They are simply a resource she is commanded to use and then discard. She hates them because she blames them for her pain, her wounds.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}日复一日，她监视着那些仆役辛苦劳作，榨干他们最后一丝活力。她的眼神里没有任何怜悯，在她眼里，那些人不过只是资源而已。她收到了命令，要用光他们，丢弃他们。她痛恨他们，因为她把她的痛苦和创伤归咎于他们。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jour après jour, elle regarde avec l'indifférence la plus totale ses serfs se tuer à la tâche. Pour elle, ils ne sont rien de plus qu'une ressource jetable. Elle les considère comme responsables de sa souffrance, de ses blessures, et les hait du plus profond de son âme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Day after day, she watches the serfs labour away, exhausting their last vestiges of strength. And there is no compassion in her eyes. They are simply a resource she is commanded to use and then discard. She hates them because she blames them for her pain, her wounds.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jour après jour, elle regarde avec l'indifférence la plus totale ses serfs se tuer à la tâche. Pour elle, ils ne sont rien de plus qu'une ressource jetable. Elle les considère comme responsables de sa souffrance, de ses blessures, et les hait du plus profond de son âme.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Her gün kölelerin kuvvetlerini son zerresine kadar tüketerek canla başla çalışmasını izliyor. Gözlerinde merhametten eser yok. Onun gözünde köleler, komutası altındaki kullanıp atılabilecek kaynaklardan ibaret. Onlardan nefret ediyor çünkü acıları... Yaraları yüzünden onları suçluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Day after day, she watches the serfs labour away, exhausting their last vestiges of strength. And there is no compassion in her eyes. They are simply a resource she is commanded to use and then discard. She hates them because she blames them for her pain, her wounds.{/n}
